name: Trajectory Game by Janean
description:
Hi! This project is for demonstration only and is free. 

This is a 2-player turn-based trajectory game. The goal is to hit the catapult of the other player with your ball until its health is 0.

To throw the ball, use your mouse. Drag and release to fire. 

You may also use keys A and D to move your catapult left (away from the center) or right (towards the center) correspondingly. However, your move is limited. Your time is also limited. Plan carefully!

Wind resistance exists! The direction of the snowfall should guide you. Also, if your catapult falls from the platform, you automatically lose the round.
